creator: rob@indelv.com
text:
In trying to import batik source into IBM VisualAge for Java, several errors
resulted. I'm not sure if they are all in the GVT module - please advise
if I should resubmit to another person. Below is a list of the errors:

DefaultCommonCSSContext
	field type Color is missing
DefaultSystemColorResolver
	interface Color is missing
	all method return types of Color are also missing
CursorFactory - createValue() & createStringValue()
	CursorFactory.super.* syntax can not compile
		this may be a VisualAge-only, static class bug
	could this be changed to use basic static methods instead?
		perhaps by storing them in a non-static class
GraphicsUtil getDestinationBounds()
	getBounds() in java.awt.GraphicsConfiguration is not defined
PadRed
	can not assign to final fields (scanStride & pixels) multiple times
	I guess it expects the assign to happen when variable is defined
GVTACIImpl setAttributeArray()
	method param TextAttribute is missing
JSVGComponent
	fields eventsEnabled, image, eventDispatcher & renderingTransform not 
visible
	method setGraphicsNode() is not visible
ImageTranscoder
	fields handler & hints not visible
PrintTranscoder
	fields handler & hints not visible

That's all. I'm looking forward to getting batik integrated into our new
xml browser. It looks terrific!
